relation.text: August -- The Day after that Drawing room I went
spent that fortnight betwēn her and St Leonards , but chiefly at the last place -- after the Dr . of the 1 st September
stayed the rest of the three Weeks
this year , m y Father leaves
adieu your sincere & affec CMG—— To Mrs Dickenson at Taxal Chapel le Frith Derbyshire single Sheet Honble Miſs Gunning Octbr . 1785
